column2: "Yes, I got the report. Your application for the unrestricted exploration permit won't be delayed. I expect great things from you."
"...and well, the regulated report ended like that. So, now listen to what I have to say."
"Free movement sounds good, but that area is not guaranteed to be safe, so it's also dangerous to go there."
"So, please don't slack on your preparation and don't be careless."
"This permit won't be earned with a half-hearted attempt. Please try to take care of yourself keeping that in mind."
"This is an explanation of the partial destruction of hostiles.  Some hostiles have places that can experience partial destruction."

"The Snow Banther and Snow Banshee that appear in Tundra can have parts such as horns or claws destroyed by inflicting a fixed amount of damage.  When performing partial destruction, drops may increase, or other special reactions depending on the boss."

"For the Snow Banther and the Snow Banshee, when destroying all of the claws on their four limbs, it will cause their legs to slip during some actions, creating a major opportunity.  Since it can lead to attack or recovery chances, actively shoot for partial destruction."
